statements: SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department, job_title, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, job_title, salary FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC, employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Human Resources' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary FROM employees WHERE job_title LIKE '%Manager%' ORDER BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000 AND department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_name FROM employees ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Marketing' AND join_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, productivity_score FROM Employees ORDER BY productivity_score DESC;
SELECT employee_name, join_date FROM Employees WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM Departments WHERE department_name LIKE '%Eng%';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department_id = 1 ORDER BY employee_name DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT employee_name, productivity_score FROM Employees JOIN Departments ON Employees.department_id = Departments.department_id WHERE Departments.department_name = 'IT' AND Employees.productivity_score > 80 ORDER BY productivity_score DESC
SELECT employee_name, join_date, productivity_score FROM Employees WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' AND productivity_score < 70

SELECT department_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS employee_count FROM Departments LEFT JOIN Employees ON Departments.department_id = Employees.department_id GROUP BY department_name HAVING employee_count > 3
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, employee_name AS assigned_employee FROM Projects JOIN Employees ON Projects.assigned_employee_id = Employees.employee_id ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT project_name FROM projects WHERE project_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, metric_type, metric_value FROM productivity_metrics WHERE metric_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'Customer%';
SELECT employee_id, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_metric_value FROM productivity_metrics GROUP BY employee_id;

SELECT assignments.assignment_id, employees.first_name, projects.project_name FROM assignments LEFT JOIN employees ON assignments.employee_id = employees.employee_id LEFT JOIN projects ON assignments.project_id = projects.project_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_metrics;
SELECT department, productivity_score FROM employee_metrics WHERE hours_worked > 40;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM department_metrics GROUP BY department;
SELECT project_name, assigned_employees AS employees_assigned FROM project_metrics ORDER BY employees_assigned DESC;
SELECT resource_name, department_allocated FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_hours < 20;
SELECT * FROM employee_metrics ORDER BY productivity_score DESC, hours_worked ASC;
SELECT department, AVG(productivity_score) AS avg_productivity_score FROM employee_metrics GROUP BY department;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(assigned_employees) AS total_assigned_employees FROM project_metrics GROUP BY project_name HAVING COUNT(assigned_employees) > 1;
SELECT resource_name, department_allocated, SUM(allocated_hours) AS total_allocated_hours FROM resource_allocation GROUP BY resource_name, department_allocated;
SELECT task_name, deadline_date FROM task_assignment WHERE deadline_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY deadline_date ASC;
